entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 9:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -30.3°C
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -33.6°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
